Public NotInheritable Class PassportAuthenticationEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class PassportAuthenticationEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This type is obsolete. The Passport authentication product is no longer supported and has been superseded by Live ID.")

summary.span: Argumento de evento que se pasa al evento mediante .

span.span: The event argument passed to the event by a .

summary.span: Como ya existe una identidad en este punto, resulta útil para adjuntar un objeto personalizado al contexto utilizando la identidad suministrada.

span.span: Since there is already an identity at this point, this is useful mainly for attaching a custom object to the context using the supplied identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta clase está desusada y ya no se admite.This class has been deprecated and is no longer supported. Microsoft Passport Network se ha reemplazado por Windows Live ID.Microsoft Passport Network has been replaced by Windows Live ID. Para obtener más información acerca de cómo utilizar Windows Live ID para autenticar usuarios en una aplicación Web, consulte [Windows Live ID SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=106346).For more information about how to use Windows Live ID to authenticate users in a Web application, see [Windows Live ID SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=106346).
